data.title: Community Clean-Up Drive
data.description: Join us for a barangay-wide clean-up. Meet at the barangay hall at 7 AM. Gloves and garbage bags will be provided.

data.title: Barangay Meeting
data.description: Monthly meeting to discuss community projects. Open to all residents. Agenda includes budget planning and community projects.

data.title: Road Maintenance
data.description: Temporary road closure on Main St for repairs. Plan alternate routes. Expected to be completed within 3 days.
